name: Lighthouse: The Dark Being
description:
This script will install "Lighthouse: The Dark Being" CD edition for ScummVM.
Big thanks to people who gave their time to permit us playing this game in the best conditions.
notes:
- You will need the 2 CD only during install
- Please report issue concerning this script on my github page:
https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/

script.custom-name: Lighthouse - The Dark Being - CD - ScummVM

content:
custom-name: Lighthouse - The Dark Being - CD - ScummVM
files:
- script: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Lighthouse%20-%20The%20Dark%20Being/clean.sh
game:
  game_id: lighthouse
  path: $GAMEDIR/LIGHTCD
  subtitles: true
installer:
- insert-disc:
    description: Please insert disc 1
    requires: 9.CSC
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/LIGHTCD1
    src: $DISC
- insert-disc:
    description: Please insert disc 2
    requires: movies/5.vmd
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/LIGHTCD2
    src: $DISC
- chmodx: script
- execute:
    file: script
scummvm:
  fullscreen: true
